name: Eu
description:
A shy boy with one arm lives in a cave with is big and strong friend that helps him with his tasks. One day, the boy wakes to find out his friend is missing and sees a strange and strong light in the far reaches of the cave

 Curious, alone and scared, the little boy decides to check what’s that light, thinking that maybe it is some doing of his friend but to reach it, he must overcome difficulties and fight away negative feelings. Will he be able to find his friend and discover what that light is ?

 With some precise platforming and with 2 legs to kick everything in your path, make your way through an immense cave to find what is beyond the shinning horizon ...
